price: Na mwenyewe akajua kwa hakika kuwa huko ndiko kufariki;
footnotes: Akayakinisha yule yaliyo mfika mauti kama lililo mshukia ni kuiacha dunia inayo pendwa, na imekwisha mfika shida yake kikomo cha mwisho.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
